ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who pass the night prostrating and standing before their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who spend their nights bowed and standing before their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who pass their nights in prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are those who spend the night worshipping their Lord, prostrating, and standing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And who spend the night prostrating and standing, for their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who spend the night in worship of their Lord, prostrate and standing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they who pass the night prostrating themselves before their Lord and standing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who pass the night prostrate to their Lord and standing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And who spend the night before their Lord, prostrate and standing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those who spend the night prostrating themselves, and standing before their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And these who pass the night before their Lord, prostrate and standing up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who spend the night for their Lord, prostrating and standing [in worship].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who spend the night in adoration of their Lord prostrate and standing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who spend the night before their Lord, prostrate and standing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who pass the night prostrating and standing to their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who pass the night prostrating themselves to their Lord and standing up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:64] and who spend the night before their Lord, prostrating (sujjad is the plural of sājid) and standing [in worship], in other words, they spend the night performing prayers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And who spend the night before their Lord) praying, (prostrate and standing) in the night prayer,
